text: I spent 12 hours a day just put in one
screw in the iPhone my name is Serge
Enzo I worked in a packet on Apple
factories in Shanghai so what I do is
just put a one screw that fosston the
speaker to the back case of the iPhone
we will start in the factories at 7:30
and then we will spend 12 hours inside
of the factories but actually we only do
10 and a half hours worth because the
brick time is deducted you get bored
because like you're just repeatedly
doing the same thing a month I get is
3000 and 100 years I think that's around
450 dollars its per month but it's
included the base salary plus 2 overtime
wages we only take a break once a week
on Sunday during my time there I think
there are about 70 thousand workers
inside of the factories the factory is
pretty big the whole factories have 7
sub factories but they are all in one
main campus there are required uniform
we have a blue hat and then we have the
pink shirt and the blue pants but we
only get one set of it and workers also
wear sleepers we have a locker room
that's where worker changing the clothes
put their phones their keys or the
meadows some workers very rarely they do
have iPhones but most of the workers
they use some kind of light China
produced phones which are cheaper we
need to swipe our car and then they have
a face recognition and then the door
will open and you get it after you get
in your way in line to go through a
metal detector
but that was during the time that I was
producing iPhone 6s when I was produced
item 7 they increase their security
level when I get into the fourth floor I
need to swipe my car again and go
through another metal detector one thing
that shocked me most I think is to edit
off the manager like yelling at workers
is kind of routine in the factories
there are still some facilities on the
chemist and
prevent workers from the suicide they
had the nets in the stairs and also all
the windows they have this ceiling like
age where you can you can jump from the
window so we live in a dorm and there
are multiple dorms in the factory some
are located inside of the main campus
some are off campus my dorm is off
campus we need to take a shuttle bus
which is about 10 minutes inside of the
room eight people live together but in
one floor we only have one restroom and
one bathroom for shower is shared by
about 200 people because we have about
20 issues in one floor workers generally
do two things they either stay in their
dorm to watch movies or on their film or
they go to internet cafe to play video
games and the games they play a lie
League of Legends and there are a
different spots that you can have food
inside of the factories one of them the
one that we had most is inside the
factory workshop building they have
eight types of combo some of them are
just noodles and with no meat and just
so much about those are the cheap ones
which is like five yuan so in the
factories I saw a lot of workers I'm
male the age is like 18 to 30 they are
very social they're very friendly and
everybody has a very interesting life
and very do make characteristics typical
in the weekend they go out of the campus
because there is a very big market very
close to the campus where there's a lot
of restaurants people get roast chickens
sometimes as a treat for their weekend
and people get beer and have a gathering
together but those are only happening in
Sunday typically you are not allowed to
drink inside of the door and also you're
not allowed to smoke in the in the dorm
and when you were drunk or you're wasted
you're not allowed to get into the door
because there are some cases that
workers fight because of that the
turnover rate is very high in the
factories people that after two weeks or
a month I want to say people are proud
of their work but I would say that they
just consider it a jobs that can give
them money some house you feel exciting
typically at the end of the day when the
line manager is counting down
saying that we have 500 pieces left 200
pieces you see workers are like smile
they talk with each other
and that was the moment that you feel
really good at the end of the day
[Music]
